owner_summaries.key_concerns: High number of reconciliation exceptions and duplicate detections

residual_risks.description: High number of flux analysis exceptions indicating potential misstatements
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Implement more stringent review processes and variance analysis

residual_risks.description: Intercompany mismatches and open HITL cases could delay financial close
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Enhance intercompany reconciliation procedures and expedite HITL case resolutions
